Sync with Mi Cloud is off
There are no exportable contacts. If you do have contacts on your phone, some data providers may not allow the contacts to be exported from the phone.

Contact widget added to Home screen
Delete the group \"%1$s\", contacts themselves will not be deleted.

"1. Save the contacts from the other device on the SIM card;
2. Open settings in the Contacts app, and then go to \"Import/Export contacts\" -- \"Import from SIM card\", hold any SIM contact to select it, select all the required contacts, and tap \"Import\"."
To call voicemail, turn off Airplane mode.
To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings.

"Yellow pages get the info about your balance by sending an SMS. Your carrier may update this info with a delay, so the numbers you get might not be accurate. If you see a mistake, you can report the inquiry SMS to help us improve this service.
To avoid frequent queries, we update balance info once a day."
Removing \"%s\" from sync will also remove any ungrouped contacts from sync.
A group with that name already exists

Not enough memory. The file may be too big.

"\"%s\" contains info from multiple accounts. Any info that can't be deleted will be hidden from your contacts list."
"You can't delete contacts from read-only accounts, but you can hide them in your contacts lists."

"MIUI will help you find and merge duplicate contacts.
To begin, tap the Merge icon at the bottom of your screen."
